summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where two characters are engaged in combat. The environment appears to be a rocky terrain with visible lava flows in the background. The character on the left is humanoid with a distinctive red, mushroom-like head and is holding a mace-like weapon. The character on the right is also red and has multiple mushroom-like caps on its body. The name "Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai" is displayed at the bottom of the screen, suggesting this is the name of the character or enemy being encountered. The interface shows various icons and a health bar, indicating gameplay elements such as abilities or items.
